goal.en: This course aims to help students acquire academic writing skills and gain basic knowledge about writing for research purposes. The course will first focus on the language and style in research papers, followed by the introduction of the writing framework (Introduction-Method-Result-Discussion) commonly seen in academic papers. This course is designed to help students learn techniques to properly outline, develop, evaluate, and reflect on their own writing. By the end of the semester, students should be able to know how to analyze and better revise their research papers based on what they have learned throughout the semester and make their work more publishable.
goal.ch: 本課程旨在幫助學生掌握學術寫作技巧，了解學術論文寫作的基本知識。前半部分的課程著重於學術論文中使用的語言和寫作風格的介紹，後半部分則深入介紹學術論文中常見的寫作框架（前言-方法-結果-討論）。 本課程將幫助學生學習到架構大綱、開展寫作、自我評估和反思自身寫作的技巧。學期結束時，學生應能根據本課程中所介紹的寫作架構和學術寫作技巧更好地修改自己的研究論文，提高論文的發表水準。
